mapper.select: SELECT p.name AS name, p.username AS username, p.userId AS userId, e.event_date AS birthdayDate FROM events e JOIN people_events pe ON e.id = pe.event_id JOIN people p ON pe.person_id = p.id WHERE e.type = 'birthday' AND EXTRACT(MONTH FROM e.event_date) = EXTRACT(MONTH FROM CURRENT_DATE) AND EXTRACT(DAY FROM e.event_date) = EXTRACT(DAY FROM CURRENT_DATE);

SELECT p.name AS name, p.username AS username, p.userId AS userId, e.event_date AS birthdayDate FROM events e JOIN people_events pe ON e.id = pe.event_id JOIN people p ON pe.person_id = p.id WHERE e.type = 'birthday' AND EXTRACT(MONTH FROM e.event_date) = EXTRACT(MONTH FROM #{date}) AND EXTRACT(DAY FROM e.event_date) = EXTRACT(DAY FROM #{date});
